channel.title: PI help
channel.description: Okay. I know my host has port forwarded right because we used a different base and it worked. But PI won't connect. We changed the client GUI and Client files to the IP and still nothing. Help? please?

item.title: PI help
item.dc:creator: @jman7 jman7
item.description:
@jman7 wrote:

These are in the client (where I put the IP)

Client.java:

if((j == 13 || j == 10) && inputString.length() > 0) {
				
					if(myPrivilege >= 2 || server.equals("gamersredux*17.*ervegame.***") || 1 == 1) {
						if(inputString.equals("region")) {
							System.out.println("Current region: " + anInt1069 + ", " + anInt1070);
						}

Client.java

Under 'Public client()

server = "gamersredux*17.*ervegame.***";

Gui.java

Under: 'public Gui(String args[]) {'

try {
			UIManager.setLookAndFeel(UIManager.getSystemLookAndFeelClassName());
			sign.signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getByName("gamersredux*17.*ervegame.***"));
			initUI();

Compiled, and still didn’t connect

Read full topic
